items.sentence: I'm so glad that you and Tom get along so well.
I hope that Tom knows when he needs to do that.
Tom has already told me that I have to do that.
Tom didn't tell me that he intended to do that.
The police officer handcuffed Tom to his chair.
Tom told me he hasn't seen Mary in a long time.
Tom sat in his rocking chair, smoking his pipe.
And that was the end of my friendship with Tom.
Do you think that Tom would do that by himself?
Tom was jealous of his neighbor's good fortune.
